frame.name: Giving_birth
frame.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Mother</fen> and <fen>Father</fen> produce a <fen>Child</fen> or an <fen>Egg</fen>. <ex><fex name="Mother">Betty</fex> <t>bore</t> <fex name="Father">Gerry</fex> <fex name="Child">three intelligent daughters</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Mother
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Mother</fen> is the female creature that produces the <fen>Child</fen>. <ex><fex name="Mother">Betty</fex> <t>bore</t> Gerry three intelligent daughters.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Child
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Child</fen> identifies the new self-motile creature produced from the <fen>Mother</fen> and <fen>Father</fen>. <ex>Betty <t>bore</t> Gerry <fex name="Child">three intelligent daughters</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Father
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Father</fen> is the male creature that copulates with the <fen>Mother</fen>, thus leading to the birth of the <fen>Child</fen>.
<ex>Betty <t>bore</t> <fex name="Father">Gerry</fex> three intelligent daughters.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the event occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Depictive</fen> identifies the phrase describing a participant of an action
<ex> Demons are <t>spawned</t> <fex name="Depict">fully formed</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which a <fen>Mother</fen> and <fen>Father</fen> produce produce a <fen>Child</fen>.
<ex>Star fish can be <t>spawned</t> <fex name="Circumstances">under the right conditions</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Egg
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Egg</fen> is an immobile object containing an organism that may hatch as a mobile, infant organism.
<ex>Female clownfish <t>lay</t> <fex name="Egg">their eggs</fex> around sea anemones</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the event occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Parents
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Mother</fen> and <fen>Father</fen> expressed together. <ex><fex name="Parents">We</fex> are going to be <t>having</t> twins!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Result
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Result</fen> of the birth. <ex>John's mother <t>bore</t> him <fex name="Result">into a wealthy family</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the intentional act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Parents</fen> (or a <fen>Father</fen> or <fen>Mother</fen>) that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>).
<ex>They <fex name="Manner">eagerly</fex> <t>spawned</t> more of their kind until there was no room for more.</ex>
</def-root>

lexUnit.name: veroorzaken.v
lexUnit.definition: de oorzaak zijn van dingen die volgen
